name: Space Turtles (gabeingoal)
description:
Space Turtles is an action packed adventure where you navigate in first person through your turtle like star ship fighting off hungry space pirates. Fire your laser cannons at your sharky enemies, repair the damage they inflict, and deliver those much needed supplies to the people of Aquarus V.

  • Race between stations on your ship to fight off the enemy
  • Collect energy cells to use at the various stations on your ship
  • Manage your resources wisely to strike a balance between offense and recovery

Controls:

WASD-Move

E-Interact

Mouse-Look around.
